00033 // ------------------------------------------------------------
00034 //        GEANT 4  include file implementation
00035 // ------------------------------------------------------------
00036 //
00037 // Class description:
00038 //
00039 // BDSTransportationProcess is a process responsible for the transportation of 
00040 // a particle, i.e. the geometrical propagation encountering the 
00041 // geometrical sub-volumes of the detectors.
00042 // It is also tasked with part of updating the "safety".
00043 
00044 // =======================================================================
00045 // Created:  19 March 1997, J. Apostolakis
00046 // =======================================================================
00047 #ifndef BDSTransportationProcess_hh
00048 #define BDSTransportationProcess_hh 1
00049 
00050 #include "G4VProcess.hh"
00051 #include "G4FieldManager.hh"
00052 
00053 #include "G4Navigator.hh"
00054 #include "G4TransportationManager.hh"
00055 #include "G4PropagatorInField.hh"
00056 #include "G4Track.hh"
00057 #include "G4Step.hh"
00058 #include "G4ParticleChangeForTransport.hh"
00059 
00060 class BDSTransportationProcess : public G4VProcess 
00061 {
00062   // Concrete class that does the geometrical transport 
00063 
00064   public:  // with description
00065 
00066      BDSTransportationProcess( G4int verbosityLevel= 1);
00067      ~BDSTransportationProcess(); 
00068 
00069      G4double      AlongStepGetPhysicalInteractionLength(
00070                              const G4Track& track,
00071                                    G4double  previousStepSize,
00072                                    G4double  currentMinimumStep, 
00073                                    G4double& currentSafety,
00074                                    G4GPILSelection* selection
00075                             );
00076 
00077      G4VParticleChange* AlongStepDoIt(
00078                              const G4Track& track,
00079                              const G4Step& stepData
00080                             );
00081 
00082      G4VParticleChange* PostStepDoIt(
00083                              const G4Track& track,
00084                              const G4Step&  stepData
00085                             );
00086        // Responsible for the relocation.
00087 
00088      G4double PostStepGetPhysicalInteractionLength(
00089                              const G4Track& ,
00090                              G4double   previousStepSize,
00091                              G4ForceCondition* pForceCond
00092                             );
00093        // Forces the PostStepDoIt action to be called, 
00094        // but does not limit the step.
00095 
00096      G4PropagatorInField* GetPropagatorInField();
00097      void SetPropagatorInField( G4PropagatorInField* pFieldPropagator);
00098        // Access/set the assistant class that Propagate in a Field.
00099 
00100      void   SetVerboseLevel( G4int verboseLevel );
00101      G4int  GetVerboseLevel() const;
00102        // Level of warnings regarding eg energy conservation
00103        // in field integration.
00104 
00105   public:  // without description
00106 
00107      G4double AtRestGetPhysicalInteractionLength(
00108                              const G4Track& ,
00109                              G4ForceCondition* 
00110                             ) { return -1.0; };
00111        // No operation in  AtRestDoIt.
00112 
00113      G4VParticleChange* AtRestDoIt(
00114                              const G4Track& ,
00115                              const G4Step&
00116                             ) {return 0;};
00117        // No operation in  AtRestDoIt.
00118 
00119   protected:
00120 
00121      G4bool               DoesGlobalFieldExist();
00122        // Checks whether a field exists for the "global" field manager.
00123 
00124   private:
00125 
00126      G4Navigator*         fLinearNavigator;
00127      G4PropagatorInField* fFieldPropagator;
00128        // The Propagators used to transport the particle
00129 
00130      // G4FieldManager*      fGlobalFieldMgr;     // Used MagneticField CC
00131        // Field Manager for the whole Detector
00132 
00133      G4ThreeVector        fTransportEndPosition;
00134      G4ThreeVector        fTransportEndMomentumDir;
00135      G4double             fTransportEndKineticEnergy;
00136      G4ThreeVector        fTransportEndSpin;
00137      G4bool               fMomentumChanged;
00138      G4bool               fEnergyChanged;
00139      G4bool               fEndGlobalTimeComputed; 
00140      G4double             fCandidateEndGlobalTime;
00141        // The particle's state after this Step, Store for DoIt
00142 
00143      G4bool               fParticleIsLooping;
00144 
00145      G4TouchableHandle    fCurrentTouchableHandle;
00146      
00147      // G4bool         fFieldExists;
00148        // Whether a magnetic field exists ...
00149        // A data member for this is problematic: it is useful only if it
00150        // can be initialised and updated -- and a scheme is not yet possible.
00151 
00152      G4bool fGeometryLimitedStep;
00153        // Flag to determine whether a boundary was reached.
00154 
00155      G4ThreeVector  fPreviousSftOrigin;
00156      G4double       fPreviousSafety; 
00157        // Remember last safety origin & value.
00158 
00159      G4ParticleChangeForTransport fParticleChange;
00160        // New ParticleChange
00161 
00162      G4double endpointDistance;
00163 
00164      G4int    fVerboseLevel;
00165        // Verbosity level for warnings
00166        // eg about energy non-conservation in magnetic field.
00167 };
